title: Falsely Declined Matches
body: I click accept when the queue pops, the queue timer completes and says I declined.  It has happened multiple times and still occurs.  I thought the problem was resolved a few patches ago, but it apparently isn't.  Yes, I'm sure I click "Accept"

replies.body:
can confirm this has been going on for long enough -__- incase you care, post of mine from 6 months ago, will say it hasn't happened to me recently though EDIT: literally just happened to me
 https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/hVninAi8-failed-to-accept-ready-check-bug

This has just started happening to me too.  Happened three times in a row and now I'm getting warnings about declining games.  I got kicked out twice telling me I didn't accept, then I missed another game because another player declined, then it told me I declined again when I've hit accept every single time.

Sent several support tickets, they told me it's packet loss... man, I've always had very good Internet connection. I think Riot should start searching for another cause instead of assuming it's a lag.
